item.title: Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 9, 2025

Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz v1.0 ETS2

The Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz is a popular mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2, especially among players who enjoy a more realistic Brazilian trucking experience. This mod focuses on a specific type of container chassis trailer made by the Brazilian manufacturer Guerra. It’s designed to carry containers, offering a unique set of cargo challenges compared to standard freight.

What to Expect from the Mod
A good quality Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz mod typically includes a high level of detail and customization to make the trailer feel authentic. You can expect features such as:
Detailed 3D Model: The trailer is modeled with a high degree of accuracy, including realistic textures and details of the chassis, axles, and container locks.
Multiple Axle Configurations: Many versions of this mod offer different axle setups (e.g., 2-axle, 3-axle, “Vanderleia”) to handle various load weights and regional regulations.
Custom Cargo: The mod often comes with its own pack of custom container loads, with different skins and weights, giving you a wide variety of jobs to take on.
Realistic Physics: The mod is designed to handle like a real container trailer, which can feel different from other trailer types. You’ll need to be mindful of the weight distribution and center of gravity.

How to Find and Install the Mod
Since this is a third-party mod, you’ll need to find a reliable source to download it.
1. Search for the Mod: Look for “Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz ETS2 mod” on YouTube or modding websites. Many mod creators showcase their work on YouTube and provide download links in the video descriptions.
2. Download the File: The mod will likely be a compressed file (like a `.zip` or `.rar`) containing a `.scs` file.
3. Install the Mod:
Extract the downloaded file to get the `.scs` file.
Copy and paste the `.scs` file into your Euro Truck Simulator 2 mod folder, which is located at `Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod`.
4. Activate in-game:
Start ETS2 and go to the **Mod Manager** before you load your profile.
Find the Guerra Porta Container mod in the list and double-click it to activate it. Make sure you apply the changes.
5. Purchase the Trailer: Once in the game, go to the **Trailer Dealer** and find the new Guerra container trailer to buy and customize it.

These types of mods are a great way to add a fresh challenge to your virtual trucking career. Enjoy hauling those containers!

Credits: LULA BOLSONARO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mercedes Benz Arocs Agrar v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 9, 2025

Mercedes Benz Arocs Agrar v1.0 ETS2

The Scania P360 by PISC GAMES is a community-made mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 that brings a highly detailed and customizable version of the Scania NTG P360 truck to the game. PISC GAMES is a well-known creator in the modding community, and their work is popular with players who enjoy a more realistic and personalized driving experience.

What to Expect from the Mod
A mod like this goes far beyond what the base game offers, focusing on providing a highly immersive and customizable experience. Key features you can expect include:
Detailed 3D Model: The mod features a meticulously crafted 3D model that closely resembles the real-life Scania NTG P360. This includes a detailed cabin, chassis, and a highly realistic interior with functional instruments.
Extensive Customization: This is a major highlight of the mod. You can expect a vast range of options to personalize your truck, such as:
Chassis: Multiple chassis options, including different lengths and axle configurations.
Body and Cargo: The mod often includes various body types, like a refrigerated box (“baú câmara fria”), as well as different animated and custom cargo options.
Accessories: A huge selection of accessories for both the interior and exterior, from custom grilles and bumpers to unique stickers and decorative items like a phone or a “vaper.”
Realistic Sounds and Physics: The mod may include a custom sound package to give the truck a more authentic engine sound. It is also designed to work with the game’s physics to provide a realistic driving feel.
Compatibility: Many versions of this mod are updated to work with the latest versions of ETS2, ensuring a smooth experience. They are also often compatible with other popular mods, like custom maps and trailers.

How to Install and Use the Mod
Installing the mod is a straightforward process, similar to other ETS2 mods.
1. Download the Mod: Find a trusted source for the mod, such as the official PISC GAMES website or YouTube channel. The file will typically be a compressed archive containing a `.scs` file.
2. Move the File: Copy the `.scs` file and paste it into your Euro Truck Simulator 2 mod folder, which is located at `Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod`.
3. Activate in Mod Manager: Launch ETS2, go to the Mod Manager before loading your profile, and double-click the Scania P360 mod to activate it. Make sure you apply the changes.
4. Buy and Customize: Once in the game, go to a Scania dealer. The new truck should be available for purchase, and you can spend hours customizing it to your liking in the workshop.
This mod is a great way to add a unique and highly detailed truck to your fleet, perfect for players who enjoy a personalized and realistic trucking experience.

Credits: RONALDO DEMOLIDOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Kelsa LED Illuminated Nameboards v1.3 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 9, 2025

Kelsa LED Illuminated Nameboards v1.3 1.55 ETS2

Pack of 4 Kelsa box type LED nameboards. Completely standalone with customizable body paint.

Features:
Fully standalone, only requires a slot on the lightbar
Slanted type – 3 width options: 900mm, 1050mm, 1250mm. Each size has a separate texture to apply the logo
Rectangle type – 650mm wide
Metal and painted body variant

Credits: obelihnio, SCS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: Toyota Corolla 2018 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 9, 2025

Toyota Corolla 2018 v1.0 ETS2

The 2018 Toyota Corolla is a reliable and practical choice, known for its strong safety features and good fuel economy. It’s a solid option if you’re looking for an affordable and low-maintenance used car. However, it’s worth noting some of its drawbacks, such as a less powerful engine and a basic infotainment system compared to some competitors.

Here’s a breakdown of what you need to know about the 2018 Toyota Corolla:

Performance and Fuel Economy

The 2018 Corolla typically comes with a 1.8-liter four-cylinder engine, which produces around 132 horsepower. While it gets the job done for daily driving, it can feel a bit underpowered, especially when accelerating to highway speeds. Most models are equipped with a continuously variable automatic transmission (CVT) that helps maximize fuel efficiency.

You can expect excellent gas mileage from the 2018 Corolla, with the standard model getting an EPA-estimated 28 MPG in the city and 36 MPG on the highway. The LE Eco trim is even more efficient, with an estimated **30 MPG in the city and 40 MPG on the highway.

Key Features and Trims
The 2018 Corolla was available in several trims, including the **L, LE, LE Eco, SE, XSE, and XLE**. Even the base L trim came with a generous list of standard features, including a rearview camera and Bluetooth connectivity.

One of the biggest selling points of the 2018 model year is the inclusion of **Toyota Safety Sense P (TSS-P)** as a standard feature on all trims.

This advanced safety suite includes:
Pre-Collision System with Pedestrian Detection
Lane Departure Alert with Steering Assist
Automatic High Beams
Dynamic Radar Cruise Control

Common Issues and Reliability
Overall, the 2018 Corolla has a great reputation for reliability, and it’s not uncommon for these cars to last well over 200,000 miles with proper maintenance. While it’s a dependable car, some owners have reported a few minor issues, such as:
Suspension noises: Some drivers have noted squeaking or creaking from the front suspension, often before 50,000 miles.
Infotainment glitches: There have been some complaints about the audio system freezing or rebooting.
Engine stalling: Some vehicles were subject to a recall due to a faulty fuel pump that could cause the engine to stall. If you’re considering a 2018 Corolla, it’s a good idea to ensure this recall has been addressed.

When shopping for a used 2018 Corolla, be sure to check for a full service history and any records of recall repairs. It’s also always a good idea to have a pre-purchase inspection from a trusted mechanic.

Credits: RLGAY 3D

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
